briefTitle: Accountability for Cancer Care Through Undoing Racism and Equity
officialTitle: Accountability for Cancer Care Through Undoing Racism and Equity
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Lung Cancer - Lung Resection Surgery within 4 months of diagnosis or stereotactic radiation Breast Cancer - Completion of surgery, radiation if surgery is breast conserving, and adjuvant chemotherapy (when indicated) within 6 months of diagnosis
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* White or African American patients aged 18 or older
* Recently received a first diagnosis of stage 1 or 2 breast or lung cancer
* Patient plans to initiate oncology treatment with curative intent

Exclusion Criteria:

* Have cognitive impairments or limited English proficiency that would preclude their ability to comprehend survey questions
